gallery.title: ACAD Network - kuzniki.net - traffic graphing
gallery.author: Gabriel Borkowski
gallery.description: This graph shows amount of total and peer2peer traffic generated by user. Online, offline decision is based on information if the computer was sending any data. (Legend translation: 'bajtow na sek DO' - eng. incoming Bps, 'bajtow na sek Z' - eng. outgoing Bps, 'razem' - eng. total, 'wylaczony' - eng. offline, 'wlaczony' - eng. online)
